title: Crime Alert 07.12.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 07.12.19
description:
Mother arrested after police find twins dead in her vehicle. Dad beats young son to death after child eats his Father's Day cake. Thousands want to adopt baby abandoned in a plastic bag on a Georgia highway.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
